episodes.title: I Spent a Day with a REAL Japanese CULT SURVIVOR
episodes.description:
Today, I spent a day with a man who escaped from Happy Science; Japan's biggest and most dangerous cult organization. What was life like living in a cult that was started by their own biological father?

MY CLOTHING BRAND: https://nonsense.jp/
